name: The Game (itch) (TeeckoGames)
description:
NOTE: This game was previously uploaded on www.gamejolt.com

"The Game" is an extremely difficult adventure puzzle game with a misterious and enigmatic history. It's made in a retro visual style a bit similar to the classic consoles of the 80's

NOTE 2: This game was made just for fun so it can be buggy sometimes, sorry for that, if you find any bug don´t forget to tell me in the comments <3
